info.description: Secure phone-based authentication backend for Ololo Gate management system with dual authentication (users & admins) and role-based access control.
info.title: Ololo Gate API

get.description: Check if the API server is running and retrieve detailed health information including status, timestamp, uptime, and environment
Retrieve audit logs of admin actions (super admin only). Returns paginated list of all administrative operations.

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing admin token

get.description: Retrieve a specific audit log entry by ID (super admin only)

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing admin token

post.description: Authenticate admin with username and password, returns permanent access token (no expiry)

400.description: Invalid request body or missing credentials

get.description: Retrieve a list of all admin accounts with pagination, search, filtering, and ordering (super admin only)

parameters.description: Order results by created_at (ASC or DESC, default: DESC)
parameters.name: order

post.description: Create a new admin account with specified role (super admin only)

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

409.description: Admin with this username already exists

get.description: Retrieve a specific admin's details by ID. Super admins can retrieve any admin. Regular admins can only retrieve their own details.

403.description: Forbidden - regular admins can only access their own record

delete.description: Delete an admin account by ID (soft delete, super admin only)

patch.description: Update an admin's details (password, username, and/or role). Super admins can update any admin. Regular admins can only update their own password and username (not role).

parameters.description: Update details (at least one field required)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Invalid admin ID or request body

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions for this operation

get.description: Check if a phone number is available for registration or account creation (public endpoint, no authentication required)
get.summary: Check if phone number is available for registration

post.description: Authenticate user with phone and password, returns access and refresh tokens. Supports device-based token invalidation.

parameters.description: Unique device identifier (optional - if provided and different from current device, previous tokens will be invalidated)
parameters.name: device_id

400.description: Invalid request body or phone format

post.description: Exchange a valid refresh token for a new access token

401.description: Invalid or expired refresh token, or token has been invalidated

post.description: Register a new user account with phone number and password (E.164 format required)

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

409.description: User with this phone number already exists

get.description: Fetch all locations from third-party API without filtering by user (admin access only)
get.summary: Get all available locations in the system

get.description: Retrieve the application's contact information (public endpoint, no authentication required). Returns empty values if contact information has not been set.

patch.description: Update or create the application's contact information (admin only). Creates a new contact record if one doesn't exist.

200.description: Contact information updated or created successfully

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing admin token

get.description: Fetch all locations from third-party API based on user's phone with their gates
get.summary: Get all locations accessible to the current user

put.description: Send command to close a specific gate to third-party API
Send command to open a specific gate to third-party API

get.description: Fetch all gates accessible to the current user for a specific location from third-party API
get.summary: Get all gates for a specific location

get.description: Retrieve a list of all registered users with pagination and search (requires admin authentication)

parameters.description: Order results by created_at (ASC or DESC, default: DESC)
parameters.name: order

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing admin token

post.description: Create a new user account and assign locations and gates via third-party API (requires admin authentication)
post.summary: Create a new user with location and gate assignment

parameters.description: User creation details with locations and gates
parameters.name: request

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing admin token

409.description: User with this phone number already exists

500.description: Internal server error or third-party API failure

get.description: Retrieve a specific user's details by ID including their assigned locations and gates from third-party API (requires admin authentication)
get.summary: Get user by ID with assigned locations and gates

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing admin token

delete.description: Delete a user account by ID (soft delete, requires admin authentication)

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing admin token

patch.description: Update a user's password (optional) and reassign locations and gates via third-party API (requires admin authentication)
patch.summary: Update user password and location/gate assignments

parameters.description: Update details (password optional, locations and gates required)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Invalid user ID or request body

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing admin token

500.description: Internal server error or third-party API failure

locations.description: Optional - if provided, will assign user to these locations and gates

description.example: Main vehicle entrance for visitors. Controlled by biometric access, opens in 3 seconds with safety sensors.

gates.description: Always include gates, even if empty array

available.description: true if phone is available, false if already in use

locations.description: Optional - if provided, will reassign user to these locations and gates

phone.description: Optional - if provided, will update phone number after checking availability

details.description: JSON with request details (what was changed)

resource_id.description: UUID or ID of affected resource

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
